questions.question: This device converts sunlight into electricity in a solar power system.
This term refers to the process of converting sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic cells.
This component stores excess electricity generated by solar panels for later use.
This device converts the direct current (DC) produced by solar panels into alternating current (AC) for use in homes and businesses.
This term refers to the practice of installing solar panels on the roofs of buildings to generate electricity.
